name: Clarr%27etu%27vilimt
content: Clarr'etu'vilimt, also known by his core name Retuvili, was a male Chiss who served as the Clarr family's Patriel on the Chiss Ascendancy planet Rhigar. In the aftermath of a battle near the planet Sunrise involving the forces of the Ascendancy and the Grysks, Retuvili met with Clarr'os'culry, a member of the Clarr family homestead defense force, and told her about the name by which other Clarr had begun to refer to her: The One They Could Not Kill.
